Text:
I am loding this torrent now. Fantastic, I have been waiting to see this movie for a long time. One I wnet into a store to bye it. It was out of stock. But there was a copy in a another store of the same video-rental-chain in the other side of town. So I took my car and went there. Only to be told that that copy was reserved for another customer. 

This leads me to the conclution that P2P-file-sharing is more effective than traditional video-stores and that video stores are not in the movie or music business, but in the logistics and transportation business. Since this is much better carried out on the internet, even if video films and music were totaly free aviable at no cost in regular stores, people would still not go there, but instead keep on loading stuff from the interhet and p2p networks.
Nice to help you get it
One of the best documentaries ever made. See it, even if you have no idea who McNamara is.
i strongly suggest anyone interested in history to watch this. i saw parts of this in my war ethics class. thanks for the upload, was really happy to find it!

Thanks for this torrent! McNamara was a murderous sonofabitch, and his later "regrets" were nothing more than crocodile tears. For you silly cunts who think that McNamara was a kind old man and a hero, ask your grandparents what they thought of this butcher!
